head.title: jscoverage
head.intro: A small guide into installing [jscoverage](https://npmjs.com/package./jscoverage). Also see [mocha-blanket](./mocha-blanket).

body.title: Install
body.elms:
#### Install via npm

```bash
npm install --save-dev jscoverage
```

#### Ignore output

```bash
echo coverage.html >> .gitignore
```

body.title: package.json
Caveats
body.elms:
If you're using jsdom, be sure to expose the `window._$jscoverage` variable into 
the `global` scope.
